title: Fevered Sleep
short: An inspirational website designed by Dust Collective and developed by Noughts & Ones.
body:
This wonderful site was designed by [Dust Collective](https://du.st/) & developed by Bristol-based studio [Noughts & Ones](https://noughtsandones.com/).

> Fevered Sleep is on a mission to make the world a more caring, curious, compassionate place, one unlikely art project at a time.

A lovely bright site with a refreshingly clean layout and striking use of imagery. A true masterclass of minimalism.

[Check it out](https://www.feveredsleep.co.uk/)!

## Related Posts:

* [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites \[April 2020]](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
